title: Citi Announces 2017 Investor Day
summary: New York - Citi will hold an Investor Day in New York City on Tuesday, July 25, 2017. Presentations will be given by CEO Michael Corbat and members of Citi's senior leadership team.
tag-2: New York – Citi will hold an Investor Day in New York City on Tuesday, July 25, 2017. Presentations will be given by CEO Michael Corbat and members of Citi's senior leadership team.
tag-3: John Gerspach, Citi's Chief Financial Officer, said, "We look forward to updating our investors on the progress we are making in executing our strategy and improving Citi's returns. We expect to host similar sessions on a regular basis going forward."
tag-4: In-person attendance is by invitation only. A more detailed agenda and dial-in information will be provided at a later date. The webcast and presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-5: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
